attributes.action: REJECT THE HUMAN EMBRYOLOGY AND FERTILISATION BILL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS BILL COULD ALLOW INCEST TO FILTER THROUGH OUR SOCIETY UNKNOWINGLY, SINCE TEST TUBE BABIES, FOR EXAMPLE, ARE NOT ALLOWED TO KNOW PARENTAL ORIGIN. IT WILL ALLOW MIXING OF ANIMAL AND CELL ORIGIN. IT WILL ALLOW DEEPER AMENDMENTS TO THE ABORTION ACT, POSSIBLY ENABLING INHUMANE KILLINGS OF CHILDREN, POSSIBLY EVEN AT THE MOMENT OF BIRTH, WHICH WE KNOW THE CHILD CAN FEEL.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
